questions.author: Loïc Lécolier
clues: I am a rich American businessman. My personal fortune is estimated at $74.1 billion in 2019.
My story was told in the film "The Social Network" in 2010, directed by David Fincher.
I am known to have co-founded one of the biggest social networks at the university.

questions.author: Loïc Lécolier
clues: I am available on all smartphones working with Android or IOS for free.
I am used to share photos and videos since 2011.
I am an application represented by a white ghost on a yellow background.

questions.author: Loïc Lécolier
clues: Originating on Japan, I became popular worldwide in the 2010s after being added to several mobile operating systems.
I'm now used a lot when someone sends a message.
I am used to show facial expressions, objects, symbols, etc... by message.
